reviewText: I bought this for my father who is a fan of WWII information, but thought that these 3 presentations would be different than what they turned out to be.
An excellent collection of never before seen coverage of WWII battles. A "must" addition to your film library!

Very detailed description of the WW2 events with individual accounts of soldiers who were at the forefront of the action. It's a film you would want to watch with full concentration. However, there's a lot of graphic pictures of dead men with extreme details. Some of mutilated bodies, etc - viewer discretion is advised....
But if you are interested in history with good detailed account of how it happened, i recommend this

Awesome collection of WW2 history shows combined in one set. Loved them when they where on the History Channel, or should I say when the History Channel was the History Channel and not the Alien Channel or the Pawn Channel, and now I love it, owning it. Great history lesson, great teaching tool and a wonderful watch.
1st DVD received could not play properly.  2nd DVD was ok.

See the 4 disc set above the WWII title.  The third disc is a geographic representative of the battles.  It was great as are the other 3 discs.  I bought 2 sets.  One for my Doctor,  because he is a WWII nut.  And one for me.  We were both in the Service.
The HD is iffy at times, the color is there, the story is compelling.  Some of the scenes are ones never before seen and the destruction is fully outlined.
